thread.title: Unintentional Wiretapping of Trump Was 'Legal' as He Wasn't Subject to Probe
thread.title_full: Unintentional Wiretapping of Trump Was 'Legal' as He Wasn't Subject to Probe

title: Unintentional Wiretapping of Trump Was 'Legal' as He Wasn't Subject to Probe
text:
Unintentional Wiretapping of Trump Was 'Legal' as He Wasn't Subject to Probe Â© AP Photo/ Alex Brandon 0 273 2 3 Donald Trump's wiretapping was legal, the House Intelligence Committee Chairman said, thus confirming the president's claims previously denied by the FBI. 
Rep. Devin Nunes said that Trump wasn't subject to the investigation. 
He added that Trump officials' names were attached to the collected intelligence data, which could be a violation of law. 
Trump's surveillance is unrelated to the investigation into his team's ties to Russia, Nunes said. 
DETAILS TO FOLLOW
